scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue mantle, holds the Christ Child on her lap. One of the Magi, kneeling, offers a gift. Another Magus stands behind him, also holding a gift, and a third Magus, depicted with darker skin, stands to the right, presenting his offering. The figures are positioned within a partially enclosed architectural setting, with brick walls and doorways visible. A star shines in the blue sky above, indicating the guiding star of Bethlehem. The ground is rendered as a green, hilly landscape.
